hint.en: This is the amount of Amps offered to the charger when starting charging.
This is the amount of Amps offered to the charger when charging stops (normally 0A).
This is the amount of Amps offered to the charger when charging is paused - Some cars does not support pausing the charging, in this case set it to the lowest Amps the car support.
The charging current offered to the car will never go below this value while charging. The pause and stop current must be less than or equal to this value.
The charging current offered to the car will never go above this value.
Please keep this resonably higher than the measured toggle time to allow sufficient slack for reliable charging control.
The time it took between the controller sent a target power change request and the used Watts was reported back to piggy.
When ticked, the device will not validate unless you create a flow to update the battery level. If you don't have this available then this checkbox should be unticked.
Please make sure a flow updates this device with how many watts the charger is actually charging with whenever the value changes.

Please make sure a flow updates this device
with the battery level whenever the value
changes or enter the device setting and untick
the battery status requirement.
Please make sure a flow updates this device with the charger status whenever a car is disconnected.
Please make sure a flow updates this device with the charger status whenever a car is connected.

Please make sure a flow updates this device with the charger status whenever an error occurs.
This is not required for device validation but it will improve the app performance.
